scripts.docs:dev:
test -f CHANGELOG.md && (echo '<!-- AUTO-GENERATED from CHANGELOG.md - DO NOT EDIT DIRECTLY -->
' > human-handbook/docs/changelog.md && cat CHANGELOG.md >> human-handbook/docs/changelog.md) && vitepress dev human-handbook
scripts.docs:build:
test -f CHANGELOG.md && (echo '<!-- AUTO-GENERATED from CHANGELOG.md - DO NOT EDIT DIRECTLY -->
' > human-handbook/docs/changelog.md && cat CHANGELOG.md >> human-handbook/docs/changelog.md) && vitepress build human-handbook
